Package api

Interface Drawable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractElement, AssociatedElement, AttachedElement, BaseElement, FlyingElement, FollowerElement, LiftElement, MovingElement, PlatformElement, SimpleElement, VanishingElement
public interface Drawable
Interface representing minimal features of something that can be drawn on a graphics context.
Author:
smkautz

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    draw(Graphics g)
    Renders this object using the given graphics context.
    int
    getHeight()
    Returns the height of this object's bounding rectangle.
    Rectangle
    getRect()
    Returns the bounding rectangle for this object as an instance of java.awt.Rectangle.
    int
    getWidth()
    Returns the width of this object's bounding rectangle.
    int
    getXInt()
    Returns the horizontal coordinate of the upper-left corner of this object's bounding rectangle, rounded to the nearest integer.
    int
    getYInt()
    Returns the vertical coordinate of the upper-left corner of this object's bounding rectangle, rounded to the nearest integer.
